channel.title: My great idea for Moparscape!
channel.description:
i was bored so i came up with this idea. basically i was thinking that Moparscape make their own game, basically like runescape but better. we can have a members area and non members area and members have to pay. if this idea develops i would like to be in charge of the html and flash because i own at it.
thanks :D :mad: :( :eek: ;) :)

item.description:

umm, we change the format for example, we change the chat so it doesnt have like a script, we chnage the skills add our own. basically we change everyhting but make it all work at the same time, we can have realms instead of worlds. if you get where i’m coming from right?
